articles.title: Martinis, seafood, and a plastic cup: The zany expenses at the center of JPMorgan's latest dispute with Charlie Javice
articles.mainIdea: Martinis, seafood, and a plastic cup: The zany expenses at the center of JPMorgan's latest dispute with Charlie Javice
articles.summary: Business Insider: Martinis, seafood, and a plastic cup: The zany expenses at the center of JPMorgan's latest dispute with Charlie Javice. JPMorgan no longer wants to pay Charlie Javice's legal bills. Inside the latest dispute between the bank and the startup founder convicted of fraud.

articles.title: JPMorgan wants out of paying the rest of Charlie Javice's legal bills — $161 seafood towers and all
